channel.title: Patch to test korg volca synchronisation via PLL object
channel.description: This patch uses two custom axo objects. A very simple PLL frequency multiplier object to get 16 steps per bar from a volca 2ppq sync and a BPM object to check the volca speed. The PLL object works but still needs some tweeking. * faster initial phase lock * better handling of fast volca speed changes * general code improvements pll.axo (1.3 KB) bpm.axo (881 Bytes) volca.axp (10.6 KB)
